name: webpack_es6_polymer_demo
description: I need to avoid the <link rel="import" Polymer spagetti. The goal: be able to use ES6 modular code with ES6 import/exports and have one or multiple application bundles. So basically have a proper Javascript build process.
author: David Valin <davidvalin@howerest.com> (http://www.howerest.com/labs)
